results.title: Equinix opens doors on new Ashburn, Va. data center
results.content: Equinix has enlarged its footprint in the Washington D.C. area with the opening of its 16th International Business Exchange (IBX) data center, DC21. | Equinix has enlarged its footprint in the ...
results.raw_content:
Equinix opens doors on new Ashburn, Va. data center
Equinix has enlarged its footprint in the Washington D.C. area with the opening of its 16th International Business Exchange (IBX) data center, DC21.
Equinix broke ground on DC21 a little over a year ago. With the addition of the DC15 data center, which opened earlier this year, Equinix has invested more $200 million in the Washington D.C. area this year.
Equinex's new Washington D.C. area data centers are part of its data center campus in Ashburn, Va.  As a strategic communications hub for the eastern U.S. as well as a major gateway to Europe, Ashburn is one of the largest peering points in North America and one of the largest in the world. In addition to colocation and data centers, Ashburn, which is located in Loudoun County, is also a key hub for hyperscale cloud providers, such as Amazon Web Services.
Loudoun County’s “data center alley” is the world’s largest concentration of data centers, with more than 18 million square feet currently in operation and millions more being planned or developed.
Equinix's 16 IBX data centers house more than 200 network service providers, which is more than any other data center provider in the Washington D.C. metro area.
The Citadel, which is owned by Switch, is currently the largest data center campus in the world. It's located in Nevada, and its campus covers an area of 7.2 million square feet. It also has the largest data center building, Tahoe Reno 1, with 1.3 million square feet of space, surpassing the previously held record by Lakeside Technology at 1.1 million square feet.
The $95 million first phase of DC21 will provide more than 41,000 square feet of colocation space, offering an initial capacity of 925 cabinets. Upon completion of the planned future phases, DC21 is expected to provide total capacity of 3,100 cabinet equivalents and colocation space of more than 124,000 square feet.
DC21, which has the headroom to expand to six data halls, is located on 34-acres, which gives Equinix the room to build up to three more IBXs. In an email to FierceTelecom, Equinix said the dates for the remaining phases of expansion in DC21 would be determined based on overall capacity needs.
The $111 million first phase of DC15 opened in the second quarter of this year with an initial capacity of 1,600 cabinet equivalents and colocation space of approximately 23,000 square feet.
The expansion of the Equinix's Ashburn Campus also included a Co-Innovation Facility (CIF), which allows technology vendors to test, demonstrate and evolve their products by working with Equinix.  The Equinix Co-Innovation Facility (CIF) elements are already in use at DC15 and in other IBXs as well.
A few examples of technology innovations being developed at the Equinix CIF include using fuel cell technology, using next generation cooling, deploying software-defined power and testing new sensors that increase sustainability.
RELATED: Equinix takes the wraps off of new bare metal service
The Washington D.C. area is also one of four markets that offer Equinix Metal. Based off of its deal to buy Packet earlier this year, Equinix announced the availability of its Equinix Metal platform early last month.
Equinix blended Packet's bare metal technology with its Equinix Fabric, which was previously known as Equinix Cloud Exchange Fabric, to spin up bare-metal servers in under 15 minutes. Equinix Fabric provides access to a software-defined interconnection service spanning 237 data centers deployed near major internet exchanges across 46 geographies.
Equinix Metal provides digital businesses with an automated "as-a-service" model, which gives companies the option to deploy the physical infrastructures of their choice at "software speed" across Equinex's platform. With Equinix Metal, businesses can click-and-configure their services via an API and common libraries, or leverage the tools that they are already using to manage infrastructure-as-code.

results.title: Dongguan Shengyi Electronics Co., Ltd. - SYE
results.content: Shengyi Electronics Co., Ltd. (Stock code: 688183), founded in 1985 and with headquartered located in Dongguan, Guangdong Province, is a national high-tech enterprise specializing in the production of high-precision, high-density and high-quality printed circuit boards.

Company profile
Shengyi Electronics Co., Ltd.（ stock code：688183 ）
Shengyi Electronics Co., Ltd. (Stock code: 688183), founded in 1985 and with headquartered located in Dongguan, Guangdong Province, is a national high-tech enterprise specializing in the production of high-precision, high-density and high-quality printed circuit boards. Now it boasts two manufacturing plants in Dongcheng of Dongguan, and Ji'an of Jiangxi Province. Depending on its mature operation management and sound quality system, and carrying forward the business philosophy as "Quality first, Customer satisfaction, Reform and Innovation and Responsibility for Win-win", Shengyi Electronics has become a leader in the PCB field with its full participation in the quality culture, top talent team, solid process and technology as well as its R&D ability and customer-oriented service spirit.

results.title: ABOUT US - Dongguan Disheng Technology Electronic
results.content: Dongguan Disheng Technology Electronic Co., Ltd was founded in 2016 and has been specializing in all kinds of smartphone screen protectors and mobile phone accessories such as chargers and cables. We produce high-quality various kinds of brands of mobile phones and tablets in the markets.
results.raw_content:
Have any Questions?
+86 0769 8263 6906
Dongguanshi Disheng Technology Electronic Co.,Ltd
A Professional Manufacturer of Screen Protectors for 6 Years
Dongguan Disheng Technology Electronic Co., Ltd was founded in 2016 and has been specializing in all kinds of smartphone screen protectors and mobile phone accessories such as chargers and cables. We produce high-quality various kinds of brands of mobile phones and tablets in the markets. One-stop services are offered, including product design and development, production, shipment, and after-sales service.
Monthly Capacity of 1,000,000 Pieces
Our factory covers an area of more than 4,800 square meters with a production capacity of more than 1,000,000 pieces per month. Well-equipped with modern machinery, we have occupied a series of advanced machines, including a CNC cutting machine, 3D curve hot forming machine, high-precision slitter, laminating machine, automatic die-cutting machine, and automatic plasma coating machine. We have an in-house testing laboratory to ensure the quality of our products. A full range of testing equipment is utilized such as high and low-temperature machines, viscosity testing equipment, transparency and blue light tester, hardness tester, UV aging tester, and CS/DOL machine for supporting harness test.
ISO9001, ISO14001, GSV, BSCI, CE, ETL, FCC, RoHS, and REACH Certificates
We are operating according to the ISO quality management system. Each process is carried out in accordance with international standards. The quality is audited by Intertek and SGS. For social responsibility, we meet BSCI requirements, while for hazardous substances we have RoHS and REACH. For energy efficiency and safety, we have CE, FCC, and ETL certifications.
OEM/ODM are Available
All OEM and ODM orders are welcome. Our experts and experienced R&D team are able to support product development in collaboration between you and us. We assist clients in product design and packaging to boost your marketing and sale.
Reliable Manufacturer
We wisely utilize ERP and implement strict quality control & inspection to ensure the highest service level to you with a short lead time of 7-10 days.
Our Clients
We establish a strong business partnership with both top ranks domestic and international brands. Our market includes almost all Asian countries, the USA, France, Germany and Australia.
Become a Business Partner Today
Accountable & Ethical firm with sincere services, Disheng will closely focus on the business philosophy of “Quality First, Customer Satisfaction and Sustainable Development”. We stand in the new development stage of China's manufacturing industry with a more vigorous attitude, hand in hand with a winning spirit.
Contact Us Today
Welcome to visit our factory or request a sample product for testing. Feel free to contact us today.

Leading R&D screen protector

results.title: Guangdong Toye Electronic Technology Co., Ltd
results.content: About US. Shenzhen Toye Technology Co.,Ltd (Dongguan Toye Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd) was founded in 2010 with a registered capital of 10 million Yuan. With more then 6 years of hard work and concentration on business, the company system with product R&D, production and sales all in one has been gradually established and the company has been growing stronger, becoming a reasonably sized ...
results.raw_content:
About US
Shenzhen Toye Technology Co.,Ltd (Dongguan Toye Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd) was founded in 2010 with a registered capital of 10 million Yuan. With more then 6 years of hard work and concentration on business, the company system with product R&D, production and sales all in one has been gradually established and the company has been growing stronger, becoming a reasonably sized enterprise with modern management.
Based on the management concept with product technology as the foundation, with product quality and reputation as the goal, and with customer satisfaction as the service tenet, the company’s has passed ISO9001:2008 Quality Management System Certification. At present, the company is fully capable of guaranteeing the product quality and providing high -quality products and satisfactory services for domestic and foreign customers steadily.
Positioning in the advanced technology, the company is specialized in R&D, production and sales of various switching power adapters, usb charger, usb power strip, car charger and so on.
The products have been widely applied in many fields, such as consumer electronics, security and protection, lighting equipment, commercial machinery and so on. In order to meet the needs of market and global customer, our serial products have passed the China 3C certification, environmental protection standards of ROHS, Japanese PSE, European CE, Australian SAA and C-Tick, Korean KC and KCC, UL/CUL/FCC/ETL for US, TUV/GS of Germany etc. The specification of our switching power adapter from 3W to 96W.
At present, the company is equipped with modern assembly line production workshops and automation equipment, such as advanced detection instruments and equipment, intelligent aging equipment, lead-free wave crest welder, automated test equipment and so on, which are used for the development and production of excellent products. And a standard plant area of 2500 square meter, two storey guarantee good working environment.
The company has more then 200 employees, including a large number of engineering technicians and technical teams for product development, quality management and distribution business. It produces about 8000-10, 000 pieces of power supply products every day and more than 250, 000 pieces every month. Our company strictly carries out ISO9001:2008 quality assurance system. Warmly welcome customers at home and abroad to come and visit or company of establishing good business cooperation.
Be the first to know our new products

results.title: Dongguan Shingi Electronics Co., Ltd.
results.content: Its order structure mainly shows the following characteristics: The high mix low volume production mode reveals that about 100 customers are actually served every year, but more than 10,000 product types are produced. The whole work order based material preparation mode leads to extensive cutting and material loss.
results.raw_content:
Dongguan Shingi Electronics Co., Ltd.
Shingi Electronics is affiliated to SHIN TECH LIMITED which was registered in Hong Kong in 1993. Establishing subsidiaries in Dongguan, Japan and Vietnam, SHIN TECH LIMITED is mainly engaged in electronic products, automotive electronics, plastic injection molding. NEOTEC has grown from a factory building with more than 300 employees into a collectivized company with more than 10,000 employees and an annual output value of more than HKD 20 billion. Since 2014, it has become one of the top ten export enterprises in Dongguan and has won many awards from national, provincial and municipal governments.
As a typical OEM factory, NEOTEC mainly gains profits from OEM business. The original manual analysis and production scheduling, manual checking of materials, and whole work order based preparation material lead to low efficiency and great quality risks, which greatly affects the delivery of products to the customers. Its order structure mainly shows the following characteristics:
The high mix low volume production mode reveals that about 100 customers are actually served every year, but more than 10,000 product types are produced. The whole work order based material preparation mode leads to extensive cutting and material loss.
More than 300 work orders are produced at the same time every day, and each line has 8~10 changeovers per day on average. All materials are fed during each changeover, resulting in a long changeover time, with an average of more than 30 minutes.
The JIT mode is introduced to solve the problem of extensive cutting and material loss:
break away from the traditional mode of the whole work order based material cutting and preparation, and adopt the first set + JIT mode with minimum packaging preparation. After the first set of materials is prepared, the system conducts real-time monitoring of production progress and material usage based on equipment networking, and promptly notifies the warehouse personnel of production line low material warning information through the mobile terminals and all kinds of kanban. The warehouse personnel then prepares the materials according to the warning information, and deliver the materials to the production line through AGV or material vehicles, forming the JIT mode.
The intelligent production switchover solution is introduced to optimize the changeover process and solve the problem of long changeover time:
break away from the traditional mode of feeding all materials during changeover. The system conducts an intelligent analysis on the material sharing of previous and next work orders, and recommends an intelligent production switchover solution. The shared materials will be automatically transferred to the next work order, and the system will give reminders of material differences to reduce repeated material preparation, return and feeding of extensive shared materials.
Through the application of JIT pull feeding and intelligent production switchover, the line changeover time is reduced from 30 minutes to 10 minutes, and the comprehensive production efficiency improved by 13%, generating an annual new output value of nearly RB 100 million.
In the first phase, 80 employees are reduced in the warehouse and production lines, marking a direct employee reduction of 28%, saving RMB 6.4 million/year of labor costs.
The inventory of self-purchased materials is reduced by 30%, WIP reduced by nearly 60 million, and all kinds of paper production statements reduced from 1140 copies to 0 copy.
Epson Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd
Shenzhen,Guangdong
Hodgen Technology Co., Ltd
Wuxi，Jiangsu
Byd Industrial Co. LTD
Huizhou, Guangdong
